WorkItem.Description:
Reproduce code:
---------------
<?php
set_include_path(get_include_path() . PATH_SEPARATOR . '/path/to/PHPExcel/Classes/');
 
require_once 'PHPExcel/Reader/Excel2007.php';
 
$objReader = new PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007;
$objExcel = $objReader->load('example..xlsx');
?>
 
Expected result:
----------------
Success without any error.
 
Actual result:
--------------
PHP Fatal error:  Class 'PHPExcel_Shared_File' not found in /path/to/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel2007.php on line 524
